item.title: The Journey Behind Velocity Lapse - Part 1
item.description: This is the start of a series of ‘devlog’ posts of my personal journey and learning process in creating an app called Velocity Lapse, from planning to launch and beyond.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! I’m a freelance web designer/developer from the U.S, serving clients with design, development, and tech support services.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This website does not have analytics or social network buttons that track you.

item.title: Site Colophon
item.description: Wondering how this site is built? It’s a very simple tech stack for this simple, minimalistic site.
